mapper.select: SELECT id, name, province, city, level FROM hospital WHERE name=#{name} ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT id, name, province, city, level FROM hospital WHERE name LIKE "%"#{name}"%" LIMIT 20

SELECT DISTINCT h.id, h.name, h.province, h.city, h.level FROM hospital h INNER JOIN product_hospital p ON h.name=p.hospital_name WHERE h.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%') AND p.product_id IN ( SELECT DISTINCT prod_id FROM product_user WHERE user_id=#{drugUserId} ) LIMIT 20
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO hospital (name, province, city, level) VALUES (#{name}, #{province}, #{city}, #{level})
